abstract: Virginia Gov Terry McAuliffe is ordering Alcoholic Beverage Control agents to be retrained after an arrest that left University of Virginia student Martese Johnson bloodied and shouting allegations of racism.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Terry McAuliffe is ordering Alcoholic Beverage Control agents to be retrained after an arrest that left a University of Virginia student bloodied and shouting allegations of racism.

headline.main: Virginia: More Training Ordered for Alcohol Control Agents
headline.print_headline: Virginia: More Training Ordered for Alcohol Control Agents

snippet: Gov. Terry McAuliffe is ordering Alcoholic Beverage Control agents to be retrained after an arrest that left a University of Virginia student bloodied and shouting allegations of racism.
